name: events2017
description: A nodeJS web service that displays Christmas events to a web page from file stores. Authentication is used to pass tokens to admins, who have to login and recieve a cookie to make additions to the list of venues and events. The service also shows external events through the "Api.Eventful" web service. A link to the cloud deployed version is also included as a text file named cloudDeployment.
author: htdv92
